ModMetaData.name: Tropi[CKAPP] Rainforest Mod
ModMetaData.author: Coercion (Textures) | KapTaiN_KaVerN (Code)
ModMetaData.description:
The purpose of this mod is to add a significant amount of new animals and plants to Tropical Biomes and increase it's fauna and flora diversity.
A Dog Said... compatibility patch included (in that case please be sure to put Tropi[CKAPP] Rainforest Mod after ADS in mod list)
